rows.label: qev092003_MSG0001
rows.name: Sorry to make you wait![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0002
rows.name: Well, you're cheerier than I expected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0003
rows.name:
I figured you'd still be moping—
that's why I put a rush on the next job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0004
rows.name:
Aw, that's sweet.
But yeah, Camber's Skell is ready for repairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0005
rows.name: Things are pretty much back to normal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0006
rows.name: I hope you're not getting his hopes up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0007
rows.name: Hmm? About what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0008
rows.name:
Anyway, back to the task at hand.
I have a new prototype for you folks to try out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0009
rows.name: More ground gear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0010
rows.name: I only work on Skell tech for maybe one in five projects.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0011
rows.name: I know you'd prefer the opposite, but them's the breaks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0012
rows.name: I'd like you to use the prototype on the indigens I specify.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0013
rows.name: There are two sites this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0014
rows.name:
I need to make sure it can handle
different weather and terrain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0015
rows.name: Makes sense. We're on it, Tika.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0016
rows.name:
My weapons won't blow up in your face.
So you don't have to worry as you test them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0017
rows.name:
This thing was amazing!
Not that I'm surprised, coming from you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0018
rows.name:
Alexa...
Did you notice anything...off about the gun?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0019
rows.name: Off?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0020
rows.name:
Yeah. Looking at the data,
it's like there's some bug or contaminant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0021
rows.name: Well, I suppose it IS getting kind of hot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0022
rows.name: Lose it, now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0022_02
rows.name: Gah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0023
rows.name: Geez! That was close![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0024
rows.name: Are you all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0025
rows.name: Fine. I guess even you slip up sometimes, huh, Tika?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0026
rows.name: Yes, but not like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0027
rows.name: That was intentional. Sabotage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0028
rows.name: Alexa...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0028_2
rows.name: Is there anyone who'd want to see you get hurt?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_JNK0010
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev092003_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that everyone loves Alexa.

rows.label: qev092003_JNK0020
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092003_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that someone is clearly gunning for her.

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0029
rows.name: Yeah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0030
rows.name:
Though I suppose my little accident
won't be making me any new friends...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0031
rows.name: No. I'm thinking someone had it out for you even before that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0032
rows.name: No way, you guys![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0033
rows.name: Yes way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0033_2
rows.name:
And if I'm right, they already had it out for you
before that failed test.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0034
rows.name: You really think it's sabotage?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0035
rows.name: Prototypes can be unstable, but we check for safety.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0036
rows.name: Especially before performing field tests.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0037
rows.name:
Yet you've just been at the center of two
potentially fatal accidents in a row.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0038
rows.name:
Fatal? You mean I almost—
Holy cheeseballs! That's crazy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0039
rows.name: But who would be doing it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0040
rows.name: I have no clue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0041
rows.name: That said...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0041_2
rows.name: I may have a way of finding out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0042
rows.name: Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0043
rows.name:
I'll analyze what's left of the prototype.
That may tell me what they did to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0044
rows.name: Thanks, Tika. You're the best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0045
rows.name: Just give me a minute here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0046
rows.name: Got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0046_2
rows.name: They planted a micro-explosive in the stock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0047
rows.name: It had a radio receiver that was detonated remotely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0048
rows.name: So if they'd hit the button while it was on my back...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0049
rows.name: You'd be little bits on the wall.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0050
rows.name: Holy crap![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0051
rows.name:
So since they didn't kill you,
murder doesn't seem to be the motive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0052
rows.name:
They just want your missions to fail.
And by fail, I mean explode.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0053
rows.name: That's almost worse![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0054
rows.name: Dunno about that, but it IS a clue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0055
rows.name:
To time the detonation like that,
they'd have to be watching you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0056
rows.name: Ohmigosh. I have a STALKER? Seriously?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev092003_SEL0031
rows.name:
Say that you should ask around
to see if anyone saw anything.

rows.label: qev092003_JNK0040
rows.name: Joke

rows.label: qev092003_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that it was you all along.

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0057
rows.name: Good plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0058
rows.name:
If we can find a witness,
we may be able to find the mystery creep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0059
rows.name: WHAAAAT?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0060
rows.name:
...No, wait.
You weren't even around for the first explosion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0061
rows.name: Man, that is totally not funny. Not at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0062
rows.name:
If you're done being dumb,
we should ask around to see if anyone saw something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0063
rows.name: Let's hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0064
rows.name:
Watch Alexa's back for me, will you?
And maybe your own, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0065
rows.name: Nice data gathering, guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0066
rows.name: Can I have the prototype back?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0067
rows.name: Nice data gathering, guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0068
rows.name: Can I have the prototype back?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0069
rows.name:
Hmm? What are we doing to clean up after Alexa's
little accident?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0070
rows.name: Look, just leave the mechanical stuff to the mechanics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0071
rows.name:
That said, it's up to you other BLADEs to do something
about a certain mopey test pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0072
rows.name: I'm leaving Alexa to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0073
rows.name:
I checked the security footage, but there was no sign of
anyone suspicious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092003_MSG0074
rows.name:
And this is awful, but it may mean it was someone
who belongs here. Someone who could come and go
without anyone questioning it.[ST:wait ]
